ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Defleet_Status__c , "Send Documents & Keys to buyer"), OR( defleetReadyCheck__c = "Not Ready", ISBLANK( Buyer_Contact__c ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Defleet_Transport_Booked__c , "Transport booked")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Defleet_Transport_Booked__c , "Awaiting payment")), NOT( Damagecheck_request_email_sent__c ), Buyer_DAL_damage_check_required__c = "YES", NOT( Ready_for_robot__c ), NOT( Deregistered_in_SKAT__c ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Vehicle_status__c , "00- - Car is defleeted")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move Defleet status without filling necessary fields
